snippet: Utilities and the Department of Homeland Security have been concerned about replacing crucial electric transformers, which could be damaged in a natural disaster or in a terrorist attack.
abstract: Utilities and the Homeland Security Department have been concerned about replacing crucial electric transformers, which could be damaged in a natural disaster or in a terrorist attack; they are carrying out an emergency drill, unlike any that electrical engineers can remember, to explore how quickly the country could recover from a crippling blow to the power grid.
lead_paragraph: Utilities and the Department of Homeland Security have been concerned about replacing crucial electric transformers, which could be damaged in a natural disaster or in a terrorist attack.
